name: Praxis API Documentation
description: API documentation for Praxis project - Experiment Management System
title: Praxis API

header.title: Introduction
header.content: This API provides endpoints for managing scientific experiments, their metrics, and experimental data. It allows you to create experiments, define metric types, record measurements, and analyze results.

footer.title: Additional Information
footer.content: For more information about the Praxis project, please contact the development team.
